name: CoreBot: survival in space
description:
UPD 26_02_23: bug found. Touch control does not work on devices with android 12 and below

Control: WASD+mouse or touch

---------------------

Once upon a time, people made machines that could study planets. They were called – operators. They flew in space, discovered new planets, studied life on new planets.

Each operator was carrying out a world mission, but something broke in the operator system.

One of the operators stopped performing the task, after that the connection with him was interrupted.

Familiar life forms began to appear on the planets, but are they real?
